hints.content:
$\green{7}1{,}830$ is composed of:  
$\green{7 \text{ ten thousands}} + 1 \text{ thousand} + 8  \text{ hundreds} + 3 \text{ tens}$.  

 We can use place value to express this in a different way.

$\green{7 \text{ ten thousands}}$ can be written as $\blue{6 \text{ ten thousands} + 1 \text{ ten thousand}}$.  

So, $\green{7 \text{ ten thousands}} + 1 \text{ thousand}$ can be regrouped this way:

$\green{7 \text{ ten thousands}} + 1 \text{ thousand}$  
$\begin{align}&=\blue{6 \text{ ten thousands} + 1 \text{ ten thousand}} + 1 \text{ thousand}\\
&= 6 \text{ ten thousands} + 10 \text{ thousands} + 1 \text{ thousand}\\
&= 6 \text{ ten thousands} + \purple{11} \text{ thousands}.
\end{align}$

The other digits will not change.

|  | | | | | | |
- | :- | :-| :-| :-| :- | :-
$71{,}830$ | $=$ | $7\text{ ten thousands}$ | $+$| $1\text{ thousand}$ | $+$| $8\text{ hundreds}$ | $+$| $3\text{ tens}$
$71{,}830$ | $=$ | $6\text{ ten thousands}$ | $+$ |$\maroonD{11\text{ thousands}}$ | $+$|  $8\text{ hundreds}$ | $+$| $3\text{ tens}$
